alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:06PM EDT until June 22 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 405 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Avis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Carroll, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, McElhattan, Mackeyville, Loganton and Lock Haven University. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lamar and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 174 to 194. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
